Parameters

You can pass parameters from the Layout Rendering pane to the Component MVC View.

In the the Layout Rendering pane, the Fiddle rendering now has a Text parameter.

The Componenent MVC View gets this parameter by first instantiating a control. This wraps the current component in an object that allows access to rendering parameters and controls this Html output.

Try this

Change the value of the Text parameter in Layout Renderings pane to Perfect
